channel.title: Elasticsearch on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Elasticsearch on TLDRBins

item.title: elasticsearch
item.description: Basic Commands # List indexes curl -s http://example.com:9200/_cat/indices?v # Dump data with index name curl -s -X GET "http://example.com:9200/<INDEX_NAME>/_search?size=100" -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d' { "query": { "match_all": {} } } ' | jq .
